thread.title: Phoenix Police K9 Rips Off Suspect's Face
thread.title_full: Phoenix Police K9 Rips Off Suspect's Face

title: Phoenix Police K9 Rips Off Suspect's Face
text:
Phoenix Police K9 Rips Off Suspect's Face posted by The News Junkie - 23 hours ago share 
WARNING: GRAPHIC VIDEO 
In the video above, you can see the conclusion of a police chase near Phoenix, Arizona where officers shot at 25 year-old Todd Munson, who was driving a stolen corvette at the time. It's unclear if Munson was already dead at the time of the attack that followed. As police K9s approached the vehicle, they repeatedly attacked Munson, ripping off his face in the process. The News Junkie - I drink too much, curse far too often and obsess over breaking news. I hope we can still be friends. Contact
